org.baswell.httproxy
Class ConnectionParameters

java.lang.Object
  org.baswell.httproxy.ConnectionParameters

public class ConnectionParameters
extends java.lang.Object

Describes the connection parameters to a proxied server.

See Also:
ProxyDirector.onRequestStart(HttpRequest)

ConnectionParameters

public ConnectionParameters(boolean ssl,
                            java.lang.String ipOrHost,
                            int port)
Parameters:
ssl - Is this connection SSL? If so the default SSL context (SSLContext.getDefault() will be used.
ipOrHost - The IP address or hostname of the server.
port - The HTTP port to connect on.

ConnectionParameters

public ConnectionParameters(java.lang.String ipOrHost,
                            int port,
                            javax.net.ssl.SSLContext sslContext)
Parameters:
ipOrHost - The IP address or hostname of the server.
port - The HTTP port to connect on.
sslContext - The SSL context to use for SSL connections (or null if this is a non-secure connection).
